Posts.Content: Zepher wrote: I had two lumpectomys since June 4th and I am waiting for the pathology report of the second operation.  I am scared and hoping to find some words of encouragement from others that have gone through the same procedures. I am very concerned about the numbness under my arm where the lymph node was removed.  My surgeon said that feeling may (or may not) come back.  Can anyone tell me how long it will take before I know if the numbness will go away and normal feeling will return to my arm?  I would also like to ask anyone that has had "balloon" radiation what to expect?  Thank you for any words of encouragement. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I am feeling anxious and I'm Waiting for Test Results Zepher kibbles
